mapper.select: SELECT id, pw, name, tel, bookmarkedAddressState, bookmarkedAddressCity, bookmarkedAddressTown, bookmarkedAddressVillage, bookmarkedAddressHamlet FROM member;
SELECT id, pw, name, tel, bookmarkedAddressState, bookmarkedAddressCity, bookmarkedAddressTown, bookmarkedAddressVillage, bookmarkedAddressHamlet FROM member WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, pw, name, tel, bookmarkedAddressState, bookmarkedAddressCity, bookmarkedAddressTown, bookmarkedAddressVillage, bookmarkedAddressHamlet) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{bookmarkedAddressState}, #{bookmarkedAddressCity}, #{bookmarkedAddressTown}, #{bookmarkedAddressVillage}, #{bookmarkedAddressHamlet});
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET pw = #{pw}, name = #{name}, tel = #{tel}, bookmarkedAddressState = #{bookmarkedAddressState}, bookmarkedAddressCity = #{bookmarkedAddressCity}, bookmarkedAddressTown = #{bookmarkedAddressTown}, bookmarkedAddressVillage = #{bookmarkedAddressVillage}, bookmarkedAddressHamlet = #{bookmarkedAddressHamlet} WHERE id = #{id};
